scripts.clean: npm run --prefix transformer clean && npm run --prefix common clean && tspc --build --clean && npm run --prefix client clean && npm run --prefix server clean
scripts.build: npm run --prefix transformer build && npm run --prefix common build && tspc --build --force && npm run --prefix client build && npm run --prefix server build
scripts.install: npm install --ignore-scripts && echo "<-- FIX: When npm install is typed from under the examples dir in a fresh cloned repo, it only wants to install its own packages (but still this prepublish script is triggerd, strangely) - so we force it to install the packages from all workspaces"
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build && cp LICENSE transformer && cp LICENSE readme.md common && cp LICENSE readme.md client && cp LICENSE readme.md server && cp LICENSE restfuncs-metapackage
scripts.publish:publish: npm run prepublish && npm publish --workspace transformer --workspace common --workspace server --workspace client --workspace restfuncs-metapackage
